label: 山里
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A country locality, which because of Japan’s topography was bound to be either in hills or mountains, or below them along a river or on the sea.  Examples in the tale include Suma, Akashi, Ōi, Uji, and Ono.[須磨,明石,大井,宇治,小野][RK]
